goal.en: "This class uses lecture materials and exercises to help students to develop a basic understanding of GIS. The goal is to help students: 1. to learn how to collect, analyze and display GIS data; 2. to apply GIS theories and practice GIS software in a self-established project."
goal.ch: 本課程經由課堂講授以及實習操作讓學生確實地熟習GIS的基本內涵以及基礎的相關應用。目的在於幫助學生具備收集、分析以及表現地理資訊等量化方法的能力。本課程將使用GIS軟體進行教學，學生將學習如何使用GIS軟體來進行空間資料的基本處理及出圖功能。

content.en: "Students should complete assignments, including readings and lab exercises. We will have one in-class exam and students are expected to complete a group project, which will be presented by an oral presentation and a short written report."
content.ch: 本課程藉演講與實作，修課學生必須完成每週實習以及作業，包含文獻閱讀與GIS實作。課程將會有一次課堂測驗以及學期計畫。計畫必須於期末前進行口頭報告並繳交書面報告。

textbook.en: "Chang, K. T., 2016, Introduction to Geographic Information Systems, 8th edition, McGraw-Hill: New York."
textbook.ch: "Chang, K. T., 2016, Introduction to Geographic Information Systems, 8th edition, McGraw-Hill: New York."

grading.en: Will be discussed in the first lecture
grading.ch: 在第一堂課程中共同討論
